info.title: Restaurant Management System API
info.description: API documentation for the Restaurant Management System.

delete.description: Deletes a menu item by its ID

description.example: Classic Italian pasta with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.

get.description: Fetches a list of all orders from the database to staff.

post.description: This API allows customers to create a new order by submitting selected ‘MenuItemsIds’ with ‘NEW’ status.

delete.description: Deletes an order by its ID, if status is not “PREPARING” or “READY”.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the order to delete

put.summary: Update the status of an order
put.description: This API allows kitchen staff to update the order status “PREPARING”, “READY”, and allows waitstaff to update the order status to “DELIVERED”.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the order to update

get.summary: Retrieve all orders for a specific customer
get.description: Fetches a list of all orders placed by a specific customer using their ID.
Fetches a list of all Review.

post.description: Allows users to create a new review by providing the reservation ID, user ID, rating, and optional content.

get.description: Fetches details of a specific review by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the review to retrieve

put.description: Allows users to update the rating and content of an existing review.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the review to update

delete.description: Allows users to delete a specific review by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the review to delete

get.summary: Get all users with their roles

200.description: List of all users with their roles
